price: Kuma ba Mu aika ba a gabãninka fãce mazãje, Munã yin wahayi zuwa gare su. Ku tambayi ma'abũta ambato* idan kun kasance ba ku sani ba.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَسۡـَٔلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلذِّكۡرِ إِن كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * Ma'abũta ambato, watau mutãnen da aka bai wa littattafan sama: Yahũdu da Nasãra.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā qablaka illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim fasalū ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum lā taʿlamūna
